A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
A travesty.  Worst movie I've ever seen.  Other's have said it\, just read some of the reviews on here that spent some time writing it out.  You'll notice almost none of the positive review give any explanation or substance to their viewpoint.

They destroyed the spirit of the movies.  As for the eventual result of the plot\, that would have been fine\, if they had done it in a way that honored the characters\, rather than crapping on them.

And the plot was a screaming mess.
